results.title: Administration of Simvastatin after Kainic Acid-Induced Status Epilepticus Restrains Chronic Temporal Lobe Epilepsy
results.text_hl: In contrast to the robust MFS observed in saline-treated animals, the extent of MFS was restrained by @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ in @<m>DISEASE_Epilepsy</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D004827 @@@epileptic@@@ @SPECIES_10116 @@@rats@@@.

citations.NLM: Xie C, Sun J, Qiao W, Lu D, Wei L, Na M, Song Y, Hou X, Lin Z. Administration of Simvastatin after Kainic Acid-Induced Status Epilepticus Restrains Chronic Temporal Lobe Epilepsy PLoS One. 2011;6(9):e24966. PMID: 21949812

results.title: Efficacy of statin therapy: possible effect of phenytoin.
results.text_hl: We report a @SPECIES_9606 @@@patient@@@ with @DISEASE_Epileptic_Syndromes @DISEASE_MESH:D000073376 @@@familial hypercholesterolaemia@@@ and @<m>DISEASE_Epilepsy</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D004827 @@@epilepsy@@@ in whom the introduction and subsequent discontinuation of @CHEMICAL_Phenytoin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D010672 @@@phenytoin@@@ were associated with marked changes in the @CHEMICAL_Lipids @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008055 @@@lipid@@@ response to treatment with @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ and @CHEMICAL_Atorvastatin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000069059 @@@atorvastatin@@@.

citations.NLM: Murphy MJ, Dominiczak MH. Efficacy of statin therapy: possible effect of phenytoin. Postgrad Med J. 1999 Jun;75(884):359-60. PMID: 10435174
